name: The Undead
startIntroPart1: 'When there's no more room in Hell, the dead will walk the earth.' - George A. Romero
startIntroPart2: 'Darkness falls across the land, the midnight hour is close at hand, creatures crawl in search of blood to terrorize y'all's neighborhood' - Vincent Price
uniques: Unhappiness from population decreased by [75]%
+30% Strength when fighting City-State units and cities
City-State Influence degrades [-100]% slower
Gifts of Gold to City-States generate [-100]% more Influence
Resting point for Influence with City-States is increased by [-60]
Golden Age length increased by [-50]%
-[33]% [All] unit maintenance costs
+[15]% Production when constructing [Military] units [in all cities]
+[-10]% Production when constructing [Wonders]
[All] units gain the [Undead] promotion
[non-air] units gain the [Breach the Walls] promotion
[Melee] units gain the [Eat the Living] promotion
[+3 Food, +2 Production, +2 Gold, +2 Happiness] from every [Graveyard]
[+3 Culture, +1 Production, +1 Gold, +1 Food] from every [Abyss]
[+4 Food, +4 Production, +4 Gold] from every [Fallout]
+[10]% Strength if within [1] tiles of a [Graveyard]
+[-50]% [Science] in all cities
+[-50]% [Culture] in all cities
+[10]% combat bonus for units fighting in [Fallout]
Units fight as though they were at full strength even when damaged
